alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Franklin; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 18 at 9:59PM CST until January 18 at 10:45PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lincoln County in south central Mississippi... Northeastern Franklin County in southwestern Mississippi... South central Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 1045 PM CST. * At 959 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vaughn, or 11 miles west of Brookhaven, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Loyd Star around 1010 PM CST. Brookhaven around 1015 PM CST. Wesson around 1025 PM CST. Martinsville around 1030 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Beauregard. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for central and southwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
